divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting at the bus stop waiting for my bus looking at the stars when i say the object fly very low over my head. It was very big around like a giant "O" with a triangle in the center holding it together. On the "O" part it had little lights all around it and had a triangle looking center that apered to be dark. In the front it had a pulsing red light. When it flew over it was very low and very quite flying in from the direction of the beach towards inland.
trends: There have been 49 other sightings in Huntington Beach
There were no other sightings in Huntington Beach on or around February 27th 2013
Summary: very big circle flying very low with a pulsing red light
